code: import React from'react';import apiClient from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProductQuickSearch(_ref){let{onSelect}=_ref;const[q,setQ]=React.useState('');const[results,setResults]=React.useState([]);React.useEffect(()=>{if(!q)return setResults([]);const t=setTimeout(async()=>{try{const r=await apiClient.api("/api/products/search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(q)));setResults(r);}catch(e){console.error(e);}},250);return()=>clearTimeout(t);},[q]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",placeholder:"Search product...",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-list",children:results.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-item",onClick:()=>onSelect(p),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontWeight:700},children:p.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:12,color:'#666'},children:[p.unit," \u2014 ",p.stock," in stock"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'right'},children:[p.sellPrice," TZS"]})]},p._id))})]});}
